hero_sub: A modular, multilingual platform designed for internationalization and harmony.
agents_sub: Discover our intelligent agents for translation and analysis.
product1_desc: Advanced solution to instantly translate and harmonize your multilingual content.
product2_desc: Intelligent semantic analysis to detect inconsistencies and optimize your texts.
product3_desc: Automate multilingual workflows to save time and ensure consistency.
faq_r1: It harmonizes your multilingual content using specialized agents.
faq_r2: French, English, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Chinese.
faq_r3: Yes, thanks to a modular and Docker-ready architecture.
histoire_intro: Our mission is to make internationalization simple and accessible.
histoire_p1: Deep_of_Fish was created to meet multilingual project needs.
histoire_p2: We believe in accessible and universal technology.
services_intro: We offer a full range of services to support your multilingual project.
service1_desc: Consulting in internationalization and multilingual management.
service2_desc: Audit and optimization of multilingual content.
